text: The 1977 Campeonato Nacional de Fútbol Profesional was first tier’s 45th season. Unión Española was the tournament’s champion, winning its fifth title. ==Standings== ==Scores== ==Relegation playoff== Deportes Ovalle relegated to Segunda División == Topscorer == {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; text-align:center;" |- !width="205"|Name !width="205"|Team !width="50"|Goals |- || Oscar Fabbiani||Palestino||34 |} ==Liguilla Pre-Copa Libertadores== \---- \---- ==Promotion/Relegation Liguilla== == See also == * 1977 Copa Chile == References == == External links == *ANFP *RSSSF Chile 1977 Category:Primera División de Chile seasons Chile Prim
title: 1977 Primera División de Chile
